page.title: 18TOURISM
page.content: {Tourism -------------------------------------- Bassingham is a very old established community.Many local and American families have had links with the area for generations.Visitors can often be seen retracing the steps of their{ancestors.}A churchyard worth visiting is Aubourn.All that remains of the nineteenth century church is the clock tower. Bed and Breakfast is available at a farmhouse on the A46-Fosse Way- On leaving the Fosse Way the area is criss-crossed with quiet country lanes making it ideal for{cyclists.}Fine steaks and various bar{meals}are available at the Five Bells Inn at Bassingham.During recent modernisation a 200 year old well was unearthed and this is now an integral feature of the very attractive lounge.
